article_title: The Public Eye: Health costs for counties rise with influx of inmates
article_text: Since the state gave counties responsibility for incarcerating lower-level offenders three years ago, health care costs at county jails have gone up dramatically – and legal actions threaten to push them even higher.

article_metadata.title: The Public Eye: Health costs for counties rise with influx of inmates | The Sacramento Bee
